name: INKz
description: This Token is a utility token for OctoHedz Project (ERC 721). The tokens will be used (burned) to purchase NFTs that will be used in the Metaverse such as Sandbox and also give access to other community features within the project (Access to discord areas and other areas on the website). INKz will also be used with other NFT partner projects (other than OctoHedz) as a cross promotion to transform some NFTs to a personalized versions by burning the INKz token. PS: we don't have Max Supply in the contract.
